text: The 2003 Formula Volkswagen Germany supported by ZF Sachs was the inaugural season of the Formula Volkswagen Germany. All drivers competed in Volkswagen powered, Dunlop shod Reynard chassis. ==Calendar and results== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Round !! Circuit !! Location !! Date !! Pole position !! Fastest lap !!
